snippet: Carmelo Anthony accepted Arron Afflalo’s challenge in the final minutes and poured in 40 points — 16 in the fourth quarter — to help the Knicks improve to 23-10.
abstract: New York Knicks defeat Orlando Magic, 114-106; Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony scores a game-high 40 points, 16 in fourth quarter.
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony accepted Arron Afflalo’s challenge in the final minutes and poured in 40 points — 16 in the fourth quarter — to help the Knicks improve to 23-10.

headline.seo: Anthony’s 40 Points Send Knicks Past Magic
headline.main: Anthony Matches Magic’s Afflalo Until It’s Time to Surpass Him
headline.print_headline: Anthony Matches Magic’s Afflalo Until It’s Time to Surpass Him
